trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp" description="Check out the 30 day free trial for Azure RemoteApp." services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp" description="Check out the 30 day free trial for Azure RemoteApp." services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />

trans-unit.source: If you have an Azure subscription, you can try <linkText>Azure RemoteApp free for 30 days</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you have an Azure subscription, you can try <linkText>Azure RemoteApp free for 30 days</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: To start, simply sign in to the Azure Management Portal, navigate to the Azure RemoteApp node, and then create a collection.
trans-unit.target: To start, simply sign in to the Azure Management Portal, navigate to the Azure RemoteApp node, and then create a collection.

trans-unit.source: This is a great way to test drive the full administrative experience before converting to a paid subscription of Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This is a great way to test drive the full administrative experience before converting to a paid subscription of Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: While in trial mode, you can create two collections with a 10 user per collection limit.
trans-unit.target: While in trial mode, you can create two collections with a 10 user per collection limit.

trans-unit.source: You can convert your trial to a paid subscription at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can convert your trial to a paid subscription at any time.

trans-unit.source: After 30 days your collections will go into disabled state if you don’t convert to paid subscription.
trans-unit.target: After 30 days your collections will go into disabled state if you don’t convert to paid subscription.

trans-unit.source: The Azure SLA does not apply to collections created in trial mode.
trans-unit.target: The Azure SLA does not apply to collections created in trial mode.

trans-unit.source: Watch a quick video on how to <linkText>create a cloud deployment</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Watch a quick video on how to <linkText>create a cloud deployment</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If you have an <linkText>Azure support plan</linkText><title></title>, you can submit a support case.
trans-unit.target: If you have an <linkText>Azure support plan</linkText><title></title>, you can submit a support case.

trans-unit.source: Everyone can submit feedback on our <linkText>Feedback forum</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Everyone can submit feedback on our <linkText>Feedback forum</linkText><title></title>.
